main event: A very large object at an estimated altitude of 3,000 feet was observed traveling slowly southward for several minutes by a Methodist minister in Fremont, Texas on January 13, 1953.
interesting points: The object was described as a 'very large' saucer-shaped UFO without wings or a tail section.
The object was observed for several minutes, but its arrival and departure were not seen.
The weather conditions at the time were clear with 15-mile visibility and moderate winds.
No air traffic was reported in the area at the time of the sighting.
No photographs or motion pictures were submitted with the report.
sighted object: A very large saucer-shaped unidentified object
